metadata.title: CVE-2024-35848 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: eeprom:at24: fix memory corruption race condition If the eeprom is not accessible,an nvmem device will be registered, the read will fail, and the device willbe torn down. If another driver accesses the nvmem device after theteardown, it will reference invalid memory. Move the failure point beforeregistering the nvmem device.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
